title: Gothic Orianna pink collar gets weird.
body:
Helloww ! 

Well there's nothing much to say except that every time I use my Gothic Orianna skin, that bug occurs. **Whenever she walks** the collar passes through her head. I don't know if I'm the only one having this problem but... And the other players in the game are also able to see it. 

Hope you'll be able to repair that!

Marika.

replies.body:
Hey KrazyPrincess! 

Thanks for the report! I was able to repro this, so you're not the only one! We'll work on getting this fixed! :]
she just wants to be a flower :-(
